subject: New York City Marathon
Running
lead_paragraph: Marilson Gomes dos Santos of Brazil won the men’s New York City Marathon in 2:08:43. Read how the race unfolded with dispatches from the race course.
snippet: Marilson Gomes dos Santos of Brazil won the men’s New York City Marathon in 2:08:43. Read how the race unfolded with dispatches from the race course.
